Comments_List: I got to see first-hand what my textbook was talking about. I learned about serious lab procedures and limitations of experimental methods.
I have done a lab chemistry course in college.

The strength is the use of the new lab facilities in SCL. Its awesome to use the benches and hoods and have so many resources. It could be improved by limiting the pre-lab quizzes. The lab reports and understanding what happened after completing the action is more important than how well you memorized what the lab manual said before going into the lab.

The lab quizzes were often too difficult and the laboratory reports were often graded quite harshly. A positive was that the teachers assistant was always willing to help out, but to a certain extent.
I would only recommend it for students willing to compress so much information into 5 weeks.
